titles.title: To repeal the provision of title 46, United States Code, requiring a license for employment in the business of salvaging on the coast of Florida.
To repeal the provision of title 46, United States Code, requiring a license for employment in the business of salvaging on the coast of Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

bill.summary: Amends federal shipping law to repeal a provision requiring both a vessel and its master to have a license to engage in the business of salvaging on the coast of Florida.
